title: Best of The Herd for Sep 17, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Sep 17, 2020
description:
-We are watching the game tonight to see if Baker is done

-LeBron is the greatest player for the longest amount of time in NBA history

-The Packers used the draft to send Aaron Rodgers a message

-Bill Belichick praises Russell Wilson

-Arians is loose with his words and its already causing issues


Guest: Greg Cosell, NFL Films
